title: BootstrapGlyphicons

metadata.description: Learn about BootstrapGlyphicons with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Bootstrap 3 Icons
Below is a list of all Bootstrap 3 Glyphicons.
Note:
Glyphicons are not supported in Bootstrap 4.
For more information about Bootstrap 3 and Glyphicons, visit our
Bootstrap 3 Tutorial.
Icon
Description
Example

practice_exercises.title: Practice Exercise
practice_exercises.description: Create an example that applies the concepts from this tutorial.

related_topics.title: C Common Pitfalls and How to Avoid Them

quiz.question:
What is Icons
Below?
options: a list of all Bootstrap 3 Glyphicons
quiz.explanation:
The correct definition of Icons
Below is 'a list of all Bootstrap 3 Glyphicons'.

quiz.question: What is Glyphicons?
options: a list of all Bootstrap 3 Glyphicons
quiz.explanation: The correct definition of Glyphicons is 'not supported in Bootstrap 4'.

summary: This tutorial covers BootstrapGlyphicons concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use BootstrapGlyphicons effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of BootstrapGlyphicons and how to apply it in your projects.
